France: Claude died. Her eldest son Francis, Dauphin of France, became Duke of Brittany.
Germany: German Peasants' War: An uprising of German-speaking peasants began.
Sweden: The Treaty of Malmö is signed. Denmark-Norway recognizes the independence of Sweden, while in return Sweden renounces its claims to Scania and Blekinge.
USA: The Italian explorer Giovanni da Verrazzano landed in the neighborhood of Chesapeake Bay and explored the Atlantic coast of North America from Florida to New Brunswick including New York Bay and Narrangansett Bay.
